sections.heading: What is 〜くなる?
sections.content:
〜くなる (ku naru) expresses a change in state or condition with い-adjectives, meaning "become [adjective]." It indicates that something or someone is changing or has changed to a new state.

English equivalent: "become [adjective]"

Structure: Remove い from い-adjective + くなる

暑い (atsui) → 暑くなる (atsuku naru) "become hot" 寒い (samui) → 寒くなる (samuku naru) "become cold" 大きい (ookii) → 大きくなる (ookiku naru) "become big"

children.heading: How to form
children.content:
[い-adjective stem] + くなる

Steps:

Take い-adjective Remove the final い Add くなる

高い (takai - expensive/high) → 高くなる (takaku naru) 安い (yasui - cheap) → 安くなる (yasuku naru) 難しい (muzukashii - difficult) → 難しくなる (muzukashiku naru) 簡単 (kantan - simple) → 簡単になる (NOT くなる - this is な-adjective)

sections.heading: Common い-adjectives with くなる

children.heading: Weather and temperature
children.content: 暑くなる (atsuku naru) - "become hot" 寒くなる (samuku naru) - "become cold" 暖かくなる (atatakaku naru) - "become warm" 涼しくなる (suzushiku naru) - "become cool" 寒くなってきた。 Samuku natte kita. "It's gotten cold." / "It's becoming cold." 春になると暖かくなる。 Haru ni naru to atatakaku naru. "When spring comes, it becomes warm."

children.heading: Size and quantity
children.content: 大きくなる (ookiku naru) - "become big/grow" 小さくなる (chiisaku naru) - "become small" 多くなる (ooku naru) - "become many/increase" 少なくなる (sukunaku naru) - "become few/decrease" 子供が大きくなった。 Kodomo ga ookiku natta. "The child grew up." / "The child became big." 人が多くなってきた。 Hito ga ooku natte kita. "The number of people has increased."

children.heading: Difficulty and ease
children.content: 難しくなる (muzukashiku naru) - "become difficult" 易しくなる (yasashiku naru) - "become easy" 簡単くなる ❌ (WRONG - 簡単 is な-adjective) 問題が難しくなった。 Mondai ga muzukashiku natta. "The problem became difficult."

children.heading: Price and cost
children.content: 高くなる (takaku naru) - "become expensive/high" 安くなる (yasuku naru) - "become cheap" 最近野菜が高くなった。 Saikin yasai ga takaku natta. "Vegetables have become expensive recently." セールで安くなる。 Se-ru de yasuku naru. "It becomes cheap on sale."

children.heading: Speed and time
children.content: 早くなる (hayaku naru) - "become early/fast" 遅くなる (osoku naru) - "become late/slow" 帰りが遅くなった。 Kaeri ga osoku natta. "I got home late." / "My return became late." だんだん早くなる。 Dandan hayaku naru. "It gradually becomes faster."

children.heading: Emotions and feelings
children.content: 嬉しくなる (ureshiku naru) - "become happy" 悲しくなる (kanashiku naru) - "become sad" 楽しくなる (tanoshiku naru) - "become fun/enjoyable" 寂しくなる (sabishiku naru) - "become lonely" その話を聞いて嬉しくなった。 Sono hanashi wo kiite ureshiku natta. "I became happy when I heard that story." 一人でいると寂しくなる。 Hitori de iru to sabishiku naru. "I become lonely when I'm alone."

children.heading: Physical conditions
children.content: 痛くなる (itaku naru) - "become painful" かゆくなる (kayuku naru) - "become itchy" 眠くなる (nemuku naru) - "become sleepy" 頭が痛くなった。 Atama ga itaku natta. "I got a headache." / "My head became painful." 夜になると眠くなる。 Yoru ni naru to nemuku naru. "When night comes, I become sleepy."

children.heading: Present/Future (will become)
children.content: 明日暑くなる。 Ashita atsuku naru. "It will become hot tomorrow." これから難しくなります。 Kore kara muzukashiku narimasu. "It will become difficult from now on."

children.heading: Past (became)
children.content: 昨日寒くなった。 Kinou samuku natta. "It became cold yesterday." 去年より高くなりました。 Kyonen yori takaku narimashita. "It became more expensive than last year."

children.heading: Progressive (becoming)
children.content: だんだん暗くなってきた。 Dandan kuraku natte kita. "It's gradually getting dark." 最近忙しくなっている。 Saikin isogashiku natte iru. "I'm getting busy recently."

children.heading: だんだん (gradually)
children.content: だんだん大きくなる。 Dandan ookiku naru. "Gradually become big." だんだん難しくなってきた。 Dandan muzukashiku natte kita. "It's gradually becoming more difficult."

children.heading: 少しずつ (little by little)
children.content: 少しずつ良くなる。 Sukoshi zutsu yoku naru. "Get better little by little." 少しずつ暖かくなってきた。 Sukoshi zutsu atatakaku natte kita. "It's getting warm little by little."

children.heading: If it becomes...
children.content: 暑くなったら、エアコンをつける。 Atsuku nattara, eakon wo tsukeru. "If it becomes hot, I'll turn on the air conditioner." 難しくなったら、助けて。 Muzukashiku nattara, tasukete. "If it becomes difficult, help me." もっと安くなれば買う。 Motto yasuku nareba kau. "If it becomes cheaper, I'll buy it."

children.heading: Won't become
children.content: 簡単くならない ❌ (WRONG) 難しくならない ✓ Muzukashiku naranai. "Won't become difficult." 安くなりません。 Yasuku narimasen. "Won't become cheap." 大きくならなかった。 Ookiku naranakatta. "Didn't become big."

children.heading: Making something become
children.content:
While くなる is for natural change, you can use causative forms:

暑くなる (natural change) - "become hot" 暑くする (make it hot) - different pattern See: [〜くする (Make)](/docs/ku-suru)

children.heading: Set phrases
children.content: 良くなる (yoku naru) - "get better" / "improve" 悪くなる (waruku naru) - "get worse" / "deteriorate" 多くなる (ooku naru) - "increase" 少なくなる (sukunaku naru) - "decrease" 病気が良くなった。 Byouki ga yoku natta. "The illness got better." 天気が悪くなった。 Tenki ga waruku natta. "The weather got worse."

children.heading: When changes occur
children.content: 春になると暖かくなる。 Haru ni naru to atatakaku naru. "When spring comes, it becomes warm." 夜になると静かくなる ❌ (静か is な-adjective) 夜になると静かになる ✓ Yoru ni naru to shizuka ni naru. "When night comes, it becomes quiet." 年を取ると弱くなる。 Toshi wo toru to yowaku naru. "When you get older, you become weak."

children.heading: Than before
children.content: 前より大きくなった。 Mae yori ookiku natta. "It became bigger than before." 去年より暑くなる。 Kyonen yori atsuku naru. "It will become hotter than last year." もっと良くなりたい。 Motto yoku naritai. "I want to become better."

children.heading: Formal situations
children.content: Casual: 寒くなる Polite: 寒くなります Past polite: 寒くなりました 明日は寒くなります。 Ashita wa samuku narimasu. "It will become cold tomorrow." 価格が高くなりました。 Kakaku ga takaku narimashita. "The price has become expensive."

children.heading: Mistake 1: Using with な-adjectives
children.content:
❌ 簡単くなる (kantan is な-adjective) ✓ 簡単になる

❌ 静かくなる (shizuka is な-adjective) ✓ 静かになる

Only use くなる with い-adjectives.

children.heading: Mistake 2: Forgetting to Remove い
children.content:
❌ 大きいくなる ✓ 大きくなる

Remove い before adding くなる.

children.heading: Mistake 3: Using with いい
children.content:
Special case: ❌ いいくなる ✓ 良くなる (yoku naru)

いい changes to 良い (yoi) → 良くなる

children.heading: Mistake 4: Confusing Natural Change with Causative
children.content: くなる = natural change (becomes) くする = make something change Don't confuse the two.

sections.heading: Summary
sections.content:
Key Points:

くなる expresses natural change with い-adjectives Formation: Remove い + add くなる Means "become [adjective]" Only works with い-adjectives (not な-adjectives) Common with: weather, size, difficulty, price, emotions Tenses: なる (will), なった (became), なっている (becoming) Special case: いい → 良くなる (yoku naru) Different from くする which means "make" Essential for describing changes in state
